metadataAttributes.Title: More Introduction to Financial Accounting
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The course builds on my Introduction to Financial Accounting course, which you should complete first. In this course, you will learn how to read, understand, and analyze most of the information provided by companies in their financial statements.  These skills will help you make more informed decisions using financial information.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Financial Accounting,Financial Statement,Accounting,Generally Accepted Accounting Principles,Accounting Terminology,
